articles.description: People who eat almonds have a lower waist circumference and lower BMI than those who do not.
articles.content: LONDON: Replacing popular snacks such as biscuits and crisps with almonds may improve endothelial function, a key indicator of cardiovascular health, and lower 'bad' cholesterol, according to a study… [+5198 chars]

articles.title: IIT Roorkee to conduct research on identifying antivirals for covid-19 treatment - India Today
articles.description: IIT Roorkee has plans to conduct a new research involving the identification of antivirals which might help in finding a treatment for the novel coronavirus.
articles.content: With the spread of covid-19 on the rise in India, the demand for a treatment to tackle the deadly virus is urgent. A lot of universities and higher educational institutes are lending their hand in re… [+2912 chars]

articles.author: Kashmira Gander
articles.title: People with Intellectual and Developmental Disabilities More Likely to Die from COVID-19, Study Suggests - Newsweek
articles.description: "More attention is needed to this vulnerable health population in order to ensure their safety and well-being during this pandemic," study author Scott Landes said.
articles.content:
People with intellectual and developmental disabilities (IDD) are more likely to die from COVID-19 than those without, according to a study.
